UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Low structural variation in the host-defense peptide repertoire of the dwarf clawed frog Hymenochirus boettgeri (Pipidae).
Literature.Author: Matthijs S, Ye L, Stijlemans B, Cornelis P, Bossuyt F, Roelants K

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli MG1655(MIC=<1µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 8325(MIC=128µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA7(MIC=4µM)
